bibl.title: Levels of Authorial Presence in Anonymus Londiniensis (P.Brit. Libr. inv. 137).
bibl.note: P. Lond. Inv. 137 recto = P. lit. Lond. 165 (= M.-P.3 2339; Marganne 102; LDAB 3964). - Recognises, within the language mosaic, an 'authorial' language or layer that basically expresses the writer's doctrinal choices. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Daniela Manetti, Levels of Authorial Presence in Anonymus Londiniensis (P.Brit. Libr. inv. 137).

P. Lond. Inv. 137 recto = P. lit. Lond. 165 (= M.-P.3 2339; Marganne 102; LDAB 3964). - Recognises, within the language mosaic, an 'authorial' language or layer that basically expresses the writer's doctrinal choices. - Avec résumé en anglais.
